sources.name: TripCSVGit
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  TripCSVGit

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared TripCSVGit = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://azurerayappastorage.blob.core.windows.net/sqldbcontainer/TripData.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = TripCSVGit,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"hack_license"}),
  #"Replaced value" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Removed columns", "VTS", "Vessel Traffic Service", Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"vendor_id"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Replaced value", each ([rate_code] = "1" or [rate_code] = "2"))
in
  #"Filtered rows";
